attributes.action: Ban unnecessary\deliberate killing and torture of insects
attributes.additional_details:
God has made humans, animals and insects, humans have lots of rights, animals have a little but how come insects have none when they feel pain and have feelings

1. They are life (if you cannot create life why destroy it)
2. They are small, helpless and defenseless (why hurt an innocent thing)

For the sake of the poor insect

1. Ban pet shops from selling alive insects for eating.
2. Ban TV shows from eating insects or even promoting it.
3. Ban the flea circus.
4. Set an appropiate penalty for those who deliberately break the law.
